name: Nike Mercurial FlyLite SuperLock
description: The Nike Mercurial FlyLite SuperLock Shin Guards use geometric columns and webbing to replace traditional foam for a lighter, thinner profile. Flexible shells are thicker in the middle and taper at the edges, creating a fit that seems to disappear as you wrap them around your legs. SuperLock technology locks into sock fibers to keep guards from sliding in the heat of the match.Shown: WhiteHyper CrimsonBlackStyle: SP2160-100
